name: nightmare
content:

B1 a very upsetting or frightening dream: a terrifying nightmare I shouldn't have watched that movie - it'll give me nightmares.
B1 an extremely unpleasant event or experience or possible event or experience: The whole journey was a nightmare - we lost our luggage and both flights were delayed. Being trapped underwater is my worst nightmare.
More examplesFewer examplesLeFanu suffered all his life from a recurrent nightmare that he was trapped in a falling house.Strange dreams and nightmares oppressed him.Working there was like being trapped in a nightmare.I had a terrible nightmare last night.Nightmares may occur in times of severe tension.
